description: This grumpy feline wants more tea! Cats are a symbol of good fortune throughout China. What better companion for a quick sip of jasmine or oolong tea?
It seems like this frog needs a good scrubbing. Frogs are a symbol of wealth and prosperity throughout China, so hop to it and brew up your favorite green tea!
Even the almighty and revered Buddha needs to take a break from Enlightenment. Some energetic black tea seems a great suggestion to refocus the mind and shake off those earthly wants!
